2200.name: A Wizard's Study
2200.description:
This study is lined with bookshelves containing tomes on the arcane arts.
Glyphs and runes cover the walls, glowing faintly with residual magical energy.
An ornate desk sits in the corner, scattered with parchment and quills.

2201.name: The Docks of Immak
2201.description:
The docks stretch along the waterfront, the air thick with salt spray and the
calls of seabirds. Fishing boats bob gently in the harbor, and the smell of
the deep ocean fills your nostrils. Mysterious currents seem to emanate
from the water itself.

2202.name: The Temple of Healing
2202.description:
This sacred temple is bathed in soft golden light that seems to emanate from
the very walls. The air smells of incense and herbs. Healing energy pulses
subtly through the stone, and you feel a sense of peace wash over you.
Alcoves contain statues of benevolent spirits and saints.

2203.name: A Dark Grove
2203.description:
Twisted trees with dark bark surround you, their branches reaching like gnarled
fingers. Shadow pools collect in the hollows between roots. The air is thick
and hard to breathe. Strange whispers seem to echo from the darkness, and
shadows move independently of any light source.

2204.name: The Fairy Glade
2204.description:
This enchanted glade is filled with shimmering flowers and ethereal light.
Delicate, iridescent butterflies flit through the air, and the sound of
crystal chimes seems to come from nowhere and everywhere. The grass feels
soft as silk beneath your feet, and you feel strangely weightless here.

2205.name: The Courier's Office
2205.description:
This modest office bears the insignia of the Courier's Guild. Maps of distant
lands cover the walls, marked with mysterious routes and waypoints. An
ancient desk holds neatly organized ledgers, and the space around the room
seems to shimmer subtly, as if reality itself is thin here.

2206.name: A Mountain Peak
2206.description:
You stand atop a snow-covered mountain peak, the world spread out below you in
all directions. Icy winds tear at your clothes, and your breath comes out in
frozen puffs. Crystal formations catch the light, casting rainbow prisms
across the white expanse. A profound silence surrounds you.

2207.name: A Scholar's Archive
2207.description:
Towering shelves of ancient books and scrolls surround you on all sides. Dust
motes drift through shafts of light. The air smells of old parchment and
learning. A sense of accumulated knowledge permeates the space. Bronze
sconces cast warm light over reading tables, and you can almost hear the
whispers of forgotten wisdom.
